Constructor.

Parameters:
pipe The pipeline.
element A pointer to the pipeline element.
x The start x-coordinate.
y The y-coordinate.
z The z-coordinate.
n The number of pixels to build.
xDelta The delta value the x-coordinate will change each pixel.
buffer A pointer to the output buffer.

Member Function Documentation

void noisepp::LineJob3D::execute ( noisepp::Cache *  cache  )  [inline, virtual]

This function is called when the job is executed.

You must overwrite this. Don't do anything thread unsafe in there!

Implements noisepp::PipelineJob.

virtual void noisepp::PipelineJob::finish (  )  [inline, virtual, inherited]

This function is called when the job is finished.

It is always called in the main thread, so you can update a progress bar here or whatever.
